insert into rtc_meeting_item (password, subject, content, start_time, duration_min, admin_password, max_member, status, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, remark) values (#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{durationMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxMember,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update rtc_meeting_item set subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, duration_min = #{durationMin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_member = #{maxMember,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_dt = #{updateDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, password, subject, content, start_time, duration_min, admin_password, max_member, status, create_dt, create_by, update_dt, update_by, remark from rtc_meeting_item where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 2
